fg_list.name: Acting Troupes
fg_list.description: A band of performers and entertainers.

fg_list.name: Cults
fg_list.description: A variety of cults, either friendly or foe.

fg_list.name: Merchant Guilds
fg_list.description: A fleshed out guild of merchants, including related quests.

fg_list.name: Savage Hordes
fg_list.description: A dangerous and wild clan of barbarians.

foo_list.name: Traveller's Inn
foo_list.description: Quick meals and menus you might find at a roadside inn, pub, or country estate.

foo_list.name: Dockside Tavern
foo_list.description: Quick meals and menus you might find at a dockside inn, pub, or tavern.

foo_list.name: Dwarven Alehouse
foo_list.description: Standard Dwarven fare from any establishment that caters to Dwarves.

foo_list.name: Trail Rations
foo_list.description: For determining what snacks have been sitting at the bottom of your pack for 150 miles.

mgc_list.name: Diseases
mgc_list.description: From magical maladies to the common cold.

mgc_list.name: Herblore
mgc_list.description: Quick and easy herbs for druids, herbalists, or healers.

mgc_list.name: Magic Wands
mgc_list.description: Wands, staffs, rods, and orbs for the fledgling wizard.

mgc_list.name: Potions
mgc_list.description: Random potions for stocking shops or treasure rooms.

mon_list.name: Cultists
mon_list.description: Zealots and fanatics for any dedicated group.

mon_list.name: Dragons
mon_list.description: Classic dragons and wyverns: hoard included.

mon_list.name: Goblins
mon_list.description: Distinctive goblins to populate your local caves.

mon_list.name: Kobolds
mon_list.description: Distinctive and individual kobolds on the fly.

mon_list.name: Trolls
mon_list.description: A variety of trolls: bridge not included.

npc_list.name: Alchemists
npc_list.description: An alchemist to serve as friend or foe.

npc_list.name: Bards
npc_list.description: Wonderful singers and talented dancers, will likely try to seduce you.

npc_list.name: Monks
npc_list.description: From wide-eyed pilgrims to brutal martial artists to cloistered scholars.

npc_list.name: Nobles
npc_list.description: Lords, Earls, Dukes, and other royalty.

obj_list.name: Coins
obj_list.description: Interesting coins to populate pockets or treasures hoards.

obj_list.name: Heirlooms
obj_list.description: Passed down from generation to generation, right into your pockets.

obj_list.name: Traps
obj_list.description: Intricate ways to check for careless adventurers.

obj_list.name: Treasure Chests
obj_list.description: Can also be used to make Mimics

obj_list.name: Useless Junk
obj_list.description: It can't all be valuable, can it?.

plo_list.name: Chaotic Cow Quests
plo_list.description: Cow centered village quests with an interesting twist.

plo_list.name: Holy Trials
plo_list.description: A test of faith from the Gods.

plo_list.name: Treasure Map
plo_list.description: A good old fashioned treasure map.

plo_list.name: Political Plots
plo_list.description: Political intrigue for any kingdom, city, or nation.

plo_list.name: Visions
plo_list.description: A baseline for prophets and divination magic users.

set_list.name: Magic Shops
set_list.description: Quick and easy stores for magical goods.

set_list.name: Military Camp
set_list.description: Military camps populated by interesting NPC's.

set_list.name: Mundane Market Stall
set_list.description: Mostly mundane goods sold out of a stall, cart, or small shop.

set_list.name: Shops
set_list.description: A merchant's shop and the merchant who runs it.

set_list.name: Simple Settlements
set_list.description: General settlements with incentives to visit them.

wil_list.name: Continent
wil_list.description: Unique continents to populate your world.

wil_list.name: Forest
wil_list.description: Quick flavor and encounters for forested regions.

wil_list.name: Jungle
wil_list.description: Quick flavor and encounters for jungle regions.

wil_list.name: Mountains
wil_list.description: Quick flavor and encounters for mountainous regions.
